text: As the world's climate emergency enters unchartered waters, industries are being forced to adapt quickly. None more so than shipping, where new International Maritime Organisation (IMO) regulations will set sail from January 1 2020, prompting a need for shippers to slash their sulphur emissions by an estimated nine million tons annually.
